metadata.job_to_be_done: Analyze revenue trends and market positioning strategies

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Bouillabaisse and Ratatouille are staple dishes showcasing the Provence region’s rich culinary history.
Nice offers a unique blend of beachside charm and historic architecture, including its famed Promenade des Anglais.
Nîmes Arena is a well-preserved Roman amphitheater used for events to this day.
Nice Carnival is one of the oldest and largest carnivals in the world, attracting thousands every year.
A week-long itinerary covers cities like Marseille, Nice, and Avignon, offering a complete cultural immersion.
